article_title: Former Intel CEO Pat Gelsinger jumps to venture capital, joins Playground Global
summary: Former Intel CEO Pat Gelsinger has transitioned to venture capital, joining Playground Global as a general partner after being ousted by Intel. Playground focuses on early-stage investments in deep technology. Gelsinger has experience in the tech industry, including working at Intel, EMC, and VMware. Under his leadership, Intel focused on semiconductor fabrication but faced challenges, resulting in a significant stock price decline. Gelsinger's predecessor, Bob Swan, also moved to venture capital after leaving Intel. Gelsinger is excited about CoreWeave's stock market debut and is interested in quantum computing, with plans to work with PsiQuantum, a Playground portfolio company.
